The project was started in 1999 and completed in 2010. It is maintained by the Centre for Ibsen Studies at the University of Oslo.\n\nThe works included in this DraCor corpus are all of Ibsen's published dramas, as well as his unpublished drama manuscripts. Also included are various versions of a selection of plays. The reason for this inclusion is that the versions often carry significant differences. Some may have been updated with a modernised language, and others in other formats.
